sentences.en: About 68 per cent of illegitimate births were jointly registered by both parents.
sentences.cn: 大约有68%的私生子是由父母双方共同登记的.

sentences.en: Article 6 Physicians, dentists, veterinarians assistant veterinarians may not use controlled drug for illegitimate medical purposes.
sentences.cn: 第6条医师 、 牙医师 、 兽医师及兽医佐非为正当医疗之目的,不得使用管制药品.

sentences.en: Children who are illegitimate can nevertheless inherit from their parents.
sentences.cn: 然而私生子能从他们父母那里继承遗产.

sentences.en: He sought illegitimate support from the government for the election.
sentences.cn: 他为这次选举寻求奥援.

sentences.en: He was the father of three legitimate children; and more than twenty illegitimate!
sentences.cn: 他有三个婚生子女, 二十多个私生子.

sentences.en: He was the illegitimate son of a notary , Messer Piero and a peasant woman, Caterina .
sentences.cn: 他是一位文盲公证人(MesserPiero)和农妇( Caterina )的儿子.

sentences.en: In this sentence the writer uses an illegitimate construction.
sentences.cn: 作者在这个句子中用了不符合语法的结构.

sentences.en: It is characterized with open and abnormal conduct, legitimate form and illegitimate nature.
sentences.cn: 它具有行为公开性、异常性 、 形式合法性以及实质违法性的法律特征.

sentences.en: Perhaps she was an illegitimate daughter.
The agency made illegitimate use of public funds.
sentences.cn: 这个机构非法动用公款.

sentences.en: Their talk never matched their walk , thus illegitimate child of hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 他们的言行从不合一, 也因此他们成为假冒为善的人.

sentences.en: They might have been illegitimate and unrecognized children of Garou wanderers.
sentences.cn: 他们有的是流浪的狼人的私生子.

sentences.en: Tsvangirai withdrew from the presidential runoff election Sunday saying that it was an illegitimate, violent sham.
sentences.cn: 茨万吉拉伊星期天宣布退出总统决选.他说,这是一场非法的 、 暴力的、虚假的选举.

sentences.en: Your ideological views are really altogether illegitimate, if not to say quite idiotic.
sentences.cn: 你的意识开态观点真的是非法的, 且不说有多愚蠢.

words.tran_cn: 违法；[法] 非法行为；犯规
私生；不法；反常，不合逻辑
使成为非法；宣布…为非法；使违规
私生的；非法的；不合理的

trans.tran_cn: 非婚生的，私生的，法律不容的，（指辩论等的结论）不合逻辑的
trans.tran_en: born to parents who are not married
